events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and classified under the Engineering department as a Software Engineer candidate.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your file and will guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, and your technical skills align well with our software development needs.
You responded promptly and positively to the initial screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm for progressing to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for you on May 10th at 2 PM UTC, where you will be assessed on coding and system design abilities.
